name: spo-add-multiple-document-libraries-with-list-template
title: Creates multiple document libraries by applying custom list template
shortDescription: Script that creates multiple libraries by applying custom list template with custom document library, site columns and site content types
longDescription: Script that creates and applies custom list template with custom document library, site columns and site content types. It will also creates custom library using new content types

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
